description:
Job title: PLM Data Entry Specialist

Contract type:

Location: Culver City

Discipline:

Remote: No

Salary: $24.00/hour - $27.00/hour

Reference: 475391

Contact name: Alissa Ochoa

Job Description

PLM Data Entry Specialist

Location: Culver City (HYBRID - WFH Monday and Friday)

Rate: Up to $27 per hour, DOE

Duration: 2-8 weeks

Job Description:

We are seeking a detail-oriented PLM Data Entry Specialist to assist with the implementation of a Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) system. This role is crucial for ensuring the accurate and timely loading of foundational data into the new system. The position is expected to last for approximately 2-8 weeks.

Key Responsibilities:


  • Enter and update data into the PLM system accurately and efficiently.
  • Verify and correct data discrepancies.
  • Collaborate with the project lead to ensure data integrity and consistency.
  • Follow established data entry procedures and protocols.
  • Maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information with discretion.


Qualifications:


  • 2+ years of experience using Centric PLM
  • Previous data entry experience preferred.
  • Strong attention to detail and accuracy.
  • Proficiency in Adobe Illustrator.
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word).
  • Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
  • Good communication and time management skills.
